resources.string: Gameplayer Emotional Modeling Application (G.E.M.A.) is an application that captures and analyses the emotional state of a game player through his/her facial expressions. The application does not store any photo or videos. As soon as the photos of the user\'s face are captured and analyzed they are deleted from everywhere.
Currently the application is using an open source game called \'Path of Anth\' developed by a person with an username: zunair-syed. Available at: https://github.com/zunair-syed/Path_of_Ants
The following emojis has been used within the application, and bellow are described the emotional states associated with them.
This application has been developed by Anton Mitkov as part of the Computer Science program of the University of Sunderland. This project is available at: https://github.com/AantonM
Welcome to \n Gameplayer Emotional Modeling Application
• Pie chart diagram representing the summed values of the main emotions during the last gameplay.
• Line diagram representing the emotions detected in each frame during the gameplay (x - frame number, y - emotion value)
User ID (only a–z, A–Z, 0–9 and \'_\' allowed)
Please insert Usert ID and select game difficulty.
Displaying of the results in realtime
Show timestamp of the frames in the Result screen.
